page.title: 11HOUSING 2
page.content: BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 HOUSING 2: Average dwelling pre-39. 2 up 2 down terrace or 3 bed semi of Victorian times.Private area of 3 bed semis of 30's era, on estate and main road.Small number of 30's 2 bed semis rented houses.There are 20 pre- Victorian dwellings, quite small, all are different in character.Average dwelling private sector post-39. 3 bed semi or detached.40% double glazed or part, most have central heating.25% have extensions or internal alterat- ions.Mostly 1st or 2nd occupants. Mainly young couples.Families of 4 on average.Average post-39 dwelling rented sector.Basically 3 or 2 bed semis.Flats or O.A.P. bungalows.15% bought by occupier,15% double glazed. Few have central heating, gas and coal fires predominant.In country areas only a few private dwellings.
